item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 5, 2025 at 2:55 AM UTC
item.description:
1. AT&T Email-to-Text Gateway Service Ending June 17 (52 points | 29 comments)
2. Learn electricity and electronics fundamentals without taking a formal course (17 points | 1 comment)
3. The blissful Zen of a good side project (184 points | 51 comments)
4. Understanding Machine Learning: From Theory to Algorithms (244 points | 34 comments)
5. Coolify: Open-source and self-hostable Heroku / Netlify / Vercel alternative (108 points | 43 comments)
6. An interactive-speed Linux computer made of only 3 8-pin chips (191 points | 69 comments)
7. The End of Sierra as We Knew It, Part 1: The Acquisition (176 points | 57 comments)
8. OpenVertebrate Presents a Database of 13,000 3D Scans of Specimens (4 points | 1 comment)
9. Increasing Timber Production, an Emergency Situation on National Forest Lands [pdf] (17 points | 3 comments)
10. Show HN: uWrap.js – A faster and more accurate text wrapping util in < 2KB (44 points | 8 comments)
11. Annotated Unix Magic Poster (24 points | discuss)
12. Show HN: Clawtype v2.1 – a one-hand chorded USB keyboard and mouse [video] (26 points | 4 comments)
13. Why Does Claude Speak Byzantine Music Notation? (73 points | 35 comments)
14. The Tcl Programming Language: A Comprehensive Guide (2nd Edition) (83 points | 52 comments)
15. Kerosene did not save the sperm whale (2024) (153 points | 51 comments)
16. The 'Judicial Black Hole' of El Salvador's Prisons Is a Warning for Americans (178 points | 57 comments)
17. Mercantilism (29 points | 9 comments)
18. Intuiting TLS (8 points | 3 comments)
19. How Airbnb measures listing lifetime value (53 points | 67 comments)
20. The Soul of an Old Machine (6 points | discuss)
21. Microsoft’s original source code (538 points | 284 comments)
22. Scaling Up Reinforcement Learning for Traffic Smoothing (21 points | 11 comments)
23. New antibiotic that kills drug-resistant bacteria found in technician's garden (364 points | 255 comments)
24. Thunder Compute (YC S24) is hiring a GPU systems engineer ( | hide)
25. Yoko: A Biography (34 points | 38 comments)
26. The Fifth Kind of Optimisation (14 points | 12 comments)
27. Study finds solo music listening boosts social well-being (241 points | 100 comments)
28. Google announces Sec-Gemini v1 a new experimental cybersecurity model (119 points | 25 comments)
29. Curl-impersonate: Special build of curl that can impersonate the major browsers (507 points | 142 comments)
30. Gumroad’s source is available (436 points | 189 comments)
